questions.quote: Boy, if I could meet a hostess, we could open up our own place.
So, Bradley. I guess this is the last place you expected to find yourself.
You don't understand. This is Fragile Frankie Merman. When we were in camp, if you upset him, he'd run out to the woods, dig a hole, and sit in it.
That's what Willie Loman told Biff before his interview, in 'Death of a salesman'.
Not. It's all been endowed to the foundation, even this townhouse.
Well, you can wear a hat all the time now. Who's stopping you?
Yeah! But get this. Viking has a deal with the Plaza Hotel, they got a two bedroom suite, there, for out-of-town clients...So guess what I did?
Hey you know, my arm really hurts. Â I wonder if its gonna affect my golf swing.
"Yeah!!! What is that? I mean isn't that sick. I mean , I'd be embarrassed to have that in my apartment."
Yeah. You know what I just realized? Suddenly, George has become much more normal than you.
